question: What is the new limit of Foreign Direct Investment in the DTH service, as of December 2020?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet has recently approved 100 per cent foreign direct investment (FDI) in Direct-to-Home (DTH) broadcasting services.
The Cabinet also approved revised guidelines for DTH services, similar to those of Commerce Ministry and increased the licence period to 20 years, from the present scenario of 10 years.
